lines.text: Are you normally psychopathically delusional?
No, I'm just going through a bad stage.
Don't get wiggy, Donna. It's not that cute past twenty-one or twenty-two.
Are you the Jacob that's been killing people by running them down in the street?
Yes, yes I am.
Yes, yes he is... Good, case solved, let's go home.
What I do is, I chase them and they run away real fast and then I shoot them in the back.
That's a good strategy.
Yes, yes it is. I always get them.

My tea's growing cold, do you think Gerdy might bring me out a new cup; I mean before you chase me down the street, shoot me in the back, rape, and then make a stew out of me, do you think that would be alright?
Who are these guys?
These are my new boyfriends.
Good, then it won't be a terrible shock when I tell you that Donna and I are to be married.
What?
Yes, I was hoping to wait for a more appropriate time...
Like when the woman might actually love you?
How did you know where I live?
I followed you.
Okaaaaay.
Can I come in?
You went to all the trouble of stalking me, I guess it would be rude to send you away.
And she loves me.

[together]
She does?
Well, she likes me an awful lot.
Yeah, sure, when you're not lying, stealing, and stalking her.
I have some work to do on myself, I admit that.
Adam, do you think I'm crazy?
I don't know for sure, but my instincts tell me yeah, you probably are.
Does that bother you?
No, not at all.
You seem pretty sane to me.
And yet here I am, walking next to you.
What is the light of the intrepid orbit?
